snippet: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan reached out to South Korea’s incoming president, Park Geun-hye, on Friday by sending a special envoy to Seoul.
abstract: Japan's new Prime Min Shinzo Abe reaches out to South Korea’s incoming president, Park Geun-hye, by sending a special envoy to Seoul with calls for mending ties that became strained under their predecessors.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe of Japan reached out to South Korea’s incoming president, Park Geun-hye, on Friday by sending a special envoy to Seoul.

headline.seo: Japanese Envoy Tries to Mend Ties With South KoreaJapanese Envoy Tries to Mend Ties With South Korea
headline.main: Japanese Envoy Tries to Mend Ties With South Korea
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Japan Tries to Ease Ill Will
